full_summary:
____________________

### Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) W8482-231189/A - Expansion Joint, Pipe

**Published by:** Department of National Defence

**Project Description:**
The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) W8482-231189/A to acquire Expansion Joint, Pipe (GSIN: N4730) for the Canadian Armed Forces.

**Items Required:**

* Item 1: Expansion Joint, Pipe (GSIN: N4730), NCAGE U0619 ICON AEROSPACE TECHNOLOGY LTD
	+ Quantity: 8
	+ Unit of Issue: Each (AY)
	+ Destination: CFB Esquimalt
* Item 2: Expansion Joint, Pipe (GSIN: N4730), NCAGE U0619 ICON AEROSPACE TECHNOLOGY LTD
	+ Quantity: 8
	+ Unit of Issue: Each (AY)
	+ Destination: CFB Halifax

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W8482-231189/A
* **Publication Date:** January 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 20, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Amendment Date:** February 1, 2023
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Trade Agreements:
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information:
For more information or to submit a bid, please contact:

* Name: Vizcaya Collado, Johan
* Email: [johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca](mailto:johan.vizcayacollado@forces.gc.ca)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2 Canada

### Documents:
Please consult the following documents:

* Amendment 002 (English)
* Amendment 001 (English)
* RFP W8482-231189 (English)
* Amendment 002 (French)
* Amendment 001 (French)
* RFP
